items.title: Structural Placeholder Pattern Enables Incremental Validation
items.summary: Create minimal structural placeholders early so build tools and quality gates can run from the first feature onward.

items.title: Start Strict Stay Strict for Quality Tools
items.summary: Adopt strict quality tool configurations from project inception; retrofitting strictness later is harder and accumulates tech debt.

items.title: Gate Integrator Pattern for Quality Themes
items.summary: Cap quality themes with a CI feature that combines all gates, acting as an integration test for tool configurations.

items.title: Small Sequential Features for Foundational Work
items.summary: Break foundational work into 3-4 small sequential features with clear dependencies for clean progression and independent verification.

items.title: Configure Quality Tools Before Writing Tests
items.summary: Configure linter and type checker before test framework so each tool validates its own config in isolation before tests add complexity.

items.title: Pytest Exit Code 5 Expected in Pre-Test Phases
items.summary: Pytest exit code 5 (no tests collected) is expected during pre-test features; automated reporting should handle it as a pass, not a failure.
